page.title: Information
page.subtitle: Practical guidelines, values, and city highlights. (Fictional project)

items.title: Safety first
items.text: Designed around safe platforms, clear signage, and predictable service.

items.title: Accessibility
items.text: Step-free access where possible, readable UI, and inclusive wayfinding.

items.title: Sustainability
items.text: Better mobility with less traffic, noise, and emissions in the city center.

items.title: Reliability
items.text: Simple lines, intuitive transfers, and service alerts when it matters.

rules.title: Metro rules

items.title: Validate before travel
items.text: Keep a valid ticket or pass ready for inspection.

items.title: Keep moving on escalators
items.text: Stand to the right, let others pass on the left.

items.title: Respect quiet zones
items.text: Lower volume and keep calls short, especially during peak hours.

items.title: No smoking / vaping
items.text: Not allowed in stations, trains, or entrances.

items.title: Priority seating
items.text: Reserved for people with reduced mobility, pregnant passengers, and the elderly.

items.title: Bikes & scooters
items.text: Allowed off-peak when space permits. Foldables anytime.

rules.disclaimer: These are illustrative guidelines for the fictional Vigo Metro project.

fines.title: Fines & enforcement

items.label: No valid ticket
items.note: Depends on repeated offenses and situation.

items.label: Vandalism / damage
items.note: Plus repair costs and legal action if needed.

fines.disclaimer: Final policies would be defined by the relevant authorities.

vigo.title: Vigo — city highlights

items.title: Waterfront city
items.text: A strong maritime identity with port life, promenades, and viewpoints.

items.title: Beaches & nature
items.text: Quick access to Samil and coastal areas, plus nearby hikes and miradores.

items.title: Culture & food
items.text: Galician cuisine, seafood, and local neighborhoods with character.

items.title: Easy connections
items.text: Rail hub + airport links make Vigo a great base for exploring the region.

about.title: About the developer
about.paragraph1: Hi, I’m {{name}}, the developer behind this project. Vigo Metro is a fictional application created for fun and exploration: a way to experiment with UI/UX, transport systems, and present a more modern, digital vision of the city of Vigo.
about.paragraph2: The project combines frontend design, data modeling, and interaction patterns inspired by real metro networks, but it has no official or institutional affiliation.
about.footer: Built as a personal UI/UX and engineering showcase · Data and services simulated.
